cast.overview: After a disease kills 98% of America's children, the surviving 2% develop superpowers and are placed in internment camps. A 16-year-old girl escapes her camp and joins a group of other teens on the run from the government.
cast.title: The Darkest Minds

cast.overview: England, early 20th century. The future writer and philologist John Ronald Reuel Tolkien (1892-1973) and three of his schoolmates create a strong bond between them as they share the same passion for literature and art, a true fellowship that strengthens as they grow up, but the outbreak of World War I threatens to shatter it.
cast.title: Tolkien

details.biography:
Patrick Leo Kenny-Gibson (born 19 April 1995) is an Irish actor. He began his career with roles in the television series The Tudors (2009), The Passing Bells (2014), The OA (2016–2019), The White Princess (2017), and Shadow and Bone (2023), and the film Tolkien (2019). Since 2024, he has starred as a young Dexter Morgan in the prequel series Dexter: Original Sin.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Patrick Gibson (actor), licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Patrick Gibson
